frozen.name: iscan
frozen.shortDescription: sane-epkowa backend for some epson scanners.
frozen.longDescription:
Includes gui-less iscan (aka. Image Scan! for Linux).
Supported hardware: at least :
GT-F720, GT-S620, Perfection V30, Perfection V300 Photo, ES-D200, ED-D350, ES-D400, GT-S50, GT-S55, GT-S80, GT-S85, Perfection V330 Photo, Perfection V500 Photo

license.fullName: Seiko Epson Corporation Software License Agreement for Linux
